risks-card.desc-1: The emerging strategies you'll find here will soon include DAFIDAO's Haskell based NAV prototype. Be sure to review the About sections carefully and make sure you understand token locking, impermanent loss, and other risks before proceeding.
risks-card.desc-2: As with all Yearn, DAFIDAO, most other blockchain products, you are responsible for educating yourself to effectively manage your holdings.
risks-card.desc-3: Welcome to the future home of the Neural Arbitrage Valve (NAV)
